title: 034 - Podcasting Underneath An Industrial Construction Zone
description: On today's show, the guys battle the elements as someone decides to run power tools directly above the studio for a good duration of the show. The guys discuss some of the things they're looking forward to watching this weekend, chat about Pop Tarts and Toaster Strudels, answer some listener questions, discuss Wendy's running into a meat shortage, and the guys give an update on the ever increasing Shahk Gang which is looking to run rampant very, very soon. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
